checkAces(int) - Method in class edu.teamsa.gambit.Player
The checkAces method will check the current players hand (user or dealer) for any aces value 11, and if the hand total value is greater than 21, will set those aces to value 1.
checkAces() - Method in class edu.teamsa.gambit.Player
This method overloads the main checkAces method and passes in a limit of 21, which we want as the default behavior for the user.
checkSoft() - Method in class edu.teamsa.gambit.Dealer
checks for a "soft 17" condition in the dealer's hand and below 17
